desc: Be Satvik is the World's FIRST One-Stop-Shop eSolution for all Satvik Product & Services. Welcome to our unique most eStore and experience Satvikta in each step at "www.BeSatvik.com"

layout.text: Yogic cum Ayurvedic food for all walks of life cherishing seasonal delicacies.
Satvik Lifestyle to us is a state of mind that indicates emotional and intellectual equilibrium and positive thinking.
Satvikta is the voice of our intuitive selves, the part of us that is innately connected to our deepest truth – Our Soil Our Farmers Our Artisans.
